thread.section_title: Hotel L'Antoine - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Delightfully quirky hotel
thread.title_full: Delightfully quirky hotel - Review of Hotel L'Antoine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ew00076
title: Delightfully quirky hotel
text:
Located close to Bastille metro station, this hotel is the ideal choice in Paris.
The rooms are amazingly decorated with everything you could need; coffee, toiletries, robes, info, mini bar, wifi
The breakfast was perfect, eggs, croissants, cheese and fruits.
The hotel is located in a trendy area of Paris, with lots of shops and decent restaurants. Takes no time at all to get to all the main tourist sites as well.
